DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to predict responses to Erbitux as a single agent in patients with Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Pharmacogenomic Study of Monotherapy Erbitux in Subjects With Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Measurable disease tumor available for biopsies Life expectancy of at least 3 months Known or documented brain metastases prior to Cetuximab therapy
DOC.keyword: Metastatic Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
